Installation
============

.. _installation:


To install **SHARP Pack**, follow the steps below:

Step 1: Clone the Source Code
-----------------------------

   Clone the **SHARP Pack 2.0** source code from the  GitHub repository:

   .. code-block:: console

      $ git clone https://github.com/fashakib/SHARP_pack.git

Step 2: Navigate to the Source Directory
----------------------------------------

   Once the package has been downloaded, navigate to the directory containing the source codes:

   .. code-block:: console

      $ cd SHARP_pack/source

Step 3: Compile the Executable
------------------------------

   Compile the **SHARP Pack** executable using the ``make`` command:

   .. code-block:: console

      $ make

Step 4: Verify the Executable
-----------------------------

   If the compilation is successful, the ``sharp.x`` executable will be generated in the `bin` directory. To verify, run:

   .. code-block:: bash

     $ ls ../bin/sharp.x



Usage
-----
After completing the installation, you can use ``sharp.x`` to perform RPSH dynamic simulations.
